short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: What if Airbnb had a listing comparison tool? It's finally here.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What if Airbnb had a listing comparison tool?
With this tool you can add a list of places you'd like to compare and see the differences side by side on a desktop computer.
